attributes.action: Maintain the current motorway speed limit at its current limit in order to prevent increasing severity of accidents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know that the faster the car you are hit by the more damage will be caused. Yes cars today have greater acceleration - this does not mean it is safe to drive at higher speeds and since UK motorways are very different to German or French counterparts the argument often used regarding the continent does not apply
